segments.text: Oh , you are out of breath ! What ’ s happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A gang of bastards are wildly shooting on the next street . We must leave this place the soonest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That it easy.They get caught before they come here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stop your nonsense ! Quick . Let ’ s leave the place !
segments.speaker: S2
